title: granular-marking
description: The granular-marking type defines how the list of marking-definition objects referenced by the marking_refs property to apply to a set of content identified by the list of selectors in the selectors property.

selectors.description: A list of selectors for content contained within the STIX object in which this property appears.

lang.description: Identifies the language of the text identified by this marking.

allOf.description: The marking_ref property specifies the ID of the marking-definition object that describes the marking.

identifier.json.title: identifier
identifier.json.description: Represents identifiers across the CTI specifications. The format consists of the name of the top-level object being identified, followed by two dashes (--), followed by a UUIDv4.
